txt.en: Taskmaster Ghamp offered you a reward to find sticks not as big as logs. This likely means smaller-sized wood, like the kindling found throughout the Grimwood.
Return to Taskmaster Ghamp at the Grimwood Lumber-yard

Grimwood-kindling can be found throughout the Grimwood area, from fallen timber. You might also find it on the Leafcull-trees in the wood.\n\nTaskmaster Ghamp, in his own way, directed you to get Grimwood-kindling for repairs at the lumber-yard.
